MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the EH11 postcode area of Edinburgh. It is necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 5:45pm to repair electrical equipment and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 7:00pm. We will update this message if this information changes We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 5:33pm on 14th December 2020.
